title: Sifu Reviews: Is it Too Brutal?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.07.22
description:
Blessing and Tim kick off the week with SIFU reviews, Halo Infinite talk, and Platinum Games' speculation.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:10:45 - Housekeeping
You smell that? It’s the smell of Review Season. A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now and it’s our SIFU review. Tim, Andy, Tam, and I have all played it and have a LOT to say about it. That’s available right now on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and on podcast services around the globe.
Speaking of Review Season, your next episode of Gamescast is coming on Valentine’s Day. And it’s our Horizon Forbidden West review. So get hyped for that and then write in your Horizon questions for next week’s PS I Love You XOXO where we’ll break down all of your Horizon Forbidden West questions answered.
PS I LOVE YOU being recorded later today and we’re talking about the ten live-service games that Sony is working on.Tuesday! I’m taking over Xbox's Twitch channel in celebration of Black History Month!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Pranksy, Manny The Bagel boy Sanchez, & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:11:55 - SIFU Review Round Up
00:23:20 - ‘Halo Infinite’ Has Fallen Outside Xbox’s Top 5, Outside Steam’s Top 100 - Paul Tassi @ Forbes‘Halo Infinite’ Has Fallen Outside Xbox’s Top 5, Outside Steam’s Top 100 - Paul Tassi @ Forbes
00:31:30 - Sony teases ‘breakthrough AI project’ created with Gran Turismo studio Polyphony - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:37:30 - Platinum’s new CEO wants to create ‘larger, riskier’ games and hints at live service focus - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:34:10 - Ad
00:37: - Sony teases ‘breakthrough AI project’ created with Gran Turismo studio Polyphony - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:42:30 - Platinum’s new CEO wants to create ‘larger, riskier’ games and hints at live service focus - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:48:40 - Dying Light 2 Has Shambled Onto Steam's 25 Most-Played Games of All Time by Concurrent Players - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:51:48 - Bandai Namco is Developing Its Own Game Engine - Theodore Nikitin @ 80 Level
00:54:20 - It looks like the Batman Arkham games could be coming to Switch - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:56:45 - Out today
00:57:19 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary

You smell that? It’s the smell of Review Season. A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now and it’s our SIFU review. Tim, Andy, Tam, and I have all played it and have a LOT to say about it. That’s available right now on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and on podcast services around the globe.

Speaking of Review Season, your next episode of Gamescast is coming on Valentine’s Day. And it’s our Horizon Forbidden West review.
